titles.title: ANCSA Unrecognized Community Landless Natives Authorization Act of 2017
ANCSA Unrecognized Community Landless Natives Authorization Act of 2017
A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act with respect to the Native Villages of Haines, Ketchikan, Petersburg, Tenakee, and Wrangell, Alaska, and for other purposes.
ANCSA Unrecognized Community Landless Natives Authorization Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
